item.title: Super Dark Deception
item.description:
Title: Super Dark Deception
Genre: Action , Indie , RPG
Developer: Glowstick Entertainment
Publisher: Glowstick Entertainment
Franchise: Dark Deception , Super Dark Deception
Release Date: Jul 12, 2024




About This Game

Super Dark Deception is a fun retro take on the hit horror game, Dark Deception! This is the first chapter of the game and contains the first 4 levels. All future Super Dark Deception DLC chapters are included in the price. This means that once the game is purchased, CH2 & CH3 DLC content will be installed for free upon release.

Features:

  • Beautiful hand-drawn 2D pixel art that gives a classic 16-bit SNES RPG look and feel.
  • Power System: Earn XP and unlock powers as you progress that will allow you to even the odds and survive longer against horrendous creatures.
  • Fast-paced Arcade Horror: Run for your life and run fast. Enemies can be stunned and avoided, but not killed.
  • Hazardous Environments: Enemies are not the only danger. The mazes themselves are full of traps, hazards, and other dangers to watch out for.
  • Unique Enemies: Every nightmare presents a unique creature that has its own distinct AI. Players will have to change up their tactics in order to survive.
Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8.1, Windows 10, or Windows 11
    • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor or equivalent
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB/ AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 60fps low settings at 1080p
    Recommended:
    • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10, or Windows 11
    • Processor: Intel Corei5-6600K/ AMD Ryzen 5 1600
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 3GB/ AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 60fps high settings at 1080p

item.title: Prospector: The First Contract
item.description:
Title: Prospector: The First Contract
Genre: Action , Adventure , Casual , Indie , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Loonworks Games
Publisher: HypeTrain Digital
Franchise: HypeTrain Digital
Release Date: Jul 12, 2024




About This Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1928080/Prospector/




Welcome to the Prospector: The First Contract - a prequel chapter where you take on your first contract as an Interstellar Prospector. Your main goal is to gather resources on a new planet. Build a living base, use supply routes for exploration, and automate your new home with robots. Once your preparations are complete, you will begin trading with distant colonies for exclusive rewards.





Scout out your surroundings by placing supply lines to provide life support in an oxygen-less environment.





Use collected resources to construct an outpost of your own design.





Craft bots as helpers to automate the logistics of crafting and shipping goods.





Scale your operation and ship more goods to make more credits which will unlock new blueprints for buildings and recipes for crafting.



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 7 and above
    • Processor: 1.2Ghz
    • Memory: 1 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 512 MB
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

item.title: The Last Alchemist
item.description:
Title: The Last Alchemist
Genre: Adventure , Simulation
Developer: Vile Monarch
Publisher: Marvelous Europe
Franchise: Marvelous Europe
Release Date: Jul 12, 2024




About This Game



Welcome to the wholesome science-fantasy world of The Last Alchemist, a third-person alchemy simulation game about the blazing pursuit of science and friendship.

Embrace your weird and wonderful role as the world's last Alchemist! You will craft your workshop from the ground up, practice alchemy by solving puzzles, befriend and understand the Agari folk, and roam a vibrant world packed with brilliant resources to bring home and make use of.

SOLVE ALCHEMY PUZZLES
Test, Combine, Transform. Extract Essences from everything you collect, fuse them together and solve Alchemy puzzles to obtain the Properties you need to discover the wonders of this charming world.



CRAFT YOUR WORKSHOP
Find and use various materials to craft your alchemical workshop. You need tools to harvest and research ingredients as well as large machines to perform further experiments. The complexity of known blueprints will increase and soon you will find yourself preparing compound substances or cultivating plants to get necessary ingredients. You can also build furniture for convenience…. and for style.



MEET THE AGARI - YOUR LITTLE MUSHROOM FRIENDS
You share your laboratory with the Agari, a local civilization of sentient mushroom creatures with their own secrets. These cute but cryptic folk run both the economy and the machines you need to optimize production. But you’ll have to work to earn their invaluable trust.



ROAM THE WILDS
Explore colorful and enchanting landscapes rich in resources, secrets, peculiar plants, fungi and minerals. Some of these unique materials need specific alchemical mixtures to be gathered. Find ways to overcome obstacles, unlock new routes and discover wondrous places among the gorgeous, lush peaks of the Alps.



https://store.steampowered.com/app/1536570/The_Last_Alchemist/



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 x64
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD FX-9590 or equivalent
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon RX 460
    • Storage: 3 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 x64
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600X or equivalent
    • Memory: 12 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 Ti / Radeon RX 5700 XT
    • Storage: 3 GB available space

item.title: Chocolate Factory Simulator: Prologue
item.description:
Title: Chocolate Factory Simulator: Prologue
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , Simulation , Free to Play
Developer: Games Incubator
Publisher: Games Incubator , PlayWay S.A.
Franchise: Games Incubator , PlayWay S.A.
Release Date: Jul 12, 2024




About This Game



https://store.steampowered.com/app/2822370/Chocolate_Factory_Simulator/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2129220/Zoo_Simulator/

Chocolate Factory Simulator: Prologue is just part of the gameplay that awaits you in the full version of the game.

Even automatons love chocolate in the world of Chocolate Factory Simulator: Prologue!

Welcome to Chocolate Factory Simulator: Prologue, where cogwheels and steam work overtime to create the most delicious chocolate! Use your clockwork workshop full of gourmet machinery to create every kind of chocolate your customers could dream up! The world’s steampunk technology is perfect for sweet-making, and all available to you in your manufacture.

Satisfy even the most particular customers.

The world of Chocolate Factory Simulator: Prologue is full of different customers from different lands and altitudes, all gathering at your factory for one thing: their favorite chocolate. Take their orders and learn their preferences to win over loyal customers. Discover the colorful world outside of your workshop through their personalities.

The art of chocolate.

Create elaborate pralines using all the steam-and-cog-powered technology at your disposal in your workshop. Discover a variety of recipes and get creative with their presentation - change your chocolate’s shape, color, and even add some accessories to make it really stand out! Wrap it up in colorful packaging and voilà! You have created a box of beautiful chocolates!

Recruit the your very own automaton!

Juggling every order and whim of your customers would be a tough task on your own. That’s why you have Nougat! Nougat is your very own personal chocolate-making automaton. Give him tasks, modify him upgrade his capabilities and you will have the best chocolatier’s assistant that you could ever ask for!

    • Memory: 12 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 970
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 15 GB available space

item.title: Dustland Delivery
item.description:
Title: Dustland Delivery
Genre: Adventure , Indie , RPG , Simulation , Strategy , Early Access
Developer: Neutron Star Studio
Publisher: Farlight Games
Release Date: Jul 11, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Jul 11, 2024




About This Game



Dustland Delivery is a post-apocalyptic survival business simulator. Scour the wastes for profit, complete missions to grow your trading empire, and assemble a rag-tag band of adventurers to turn your city into the capital of the Dustlands.

Marshal Resources to Build Your Dustland Empire

  • A vast game world with a rich narrative to explore
  • Establish trade routes across unique settlements to become a kingpin of the wastes
  • Control resource flows to build magnificent cities

Transform Your Truck for Apocalyptic Adventures

  • Create your own mobile base to cruise through the Dustlands
  • Install mods to turn your truck into a deadly weapon against infected swarms

A Cast of Unique Companions

  • Recruit a rag-tag group of adventurers with distinctive traits
  • Assign different roles to help build your city
  • Tool up and train animal companions to boost your team's stats
  • Undead? No excuse not to show up for work...

Random Events, Freedom to Choose

  • Countless random events: armored motorcades, undead raids, unknown signals from mysterious locations...
  • Your Dustland, your way: become a warrior for justice, a money-grubbing merchant, or an infamous bandit

Struggle for Power, Rebuild the Wastes

  • 6 major factions with a web of complex relations
  • Exploit power struggles and trading rivalries to come out on top
  • Form alliances, stir up trouble, and build your own power base

Complex Weather System

  • Forge a path through the Dustlands while fighting storms and hidden dangers
  • Set up camp to shelter from the elements, then ride out at daybreak



We would like to express our heartfelt gratitude to the player who contributed to the guide of the game, with special thanks to XJ.Chen for the invaluable input.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 3 GB available space
